免疫印迹(western Blot) 是根据抗原抗体的特异性结合来检测复杂样品中的某种蛋白的方法，它通过电泳把分离的蛋白质组分从凝胶转 …
用西方墨点法(Western blot)再度作进一步的确认,而当经证实又是阳性反应时, 则表示确定已感染到HIV病毒,并且可能会传染HIV,但不 …
关于免疫印迹法（western blot） 原理：通过电泳区分不同的组分，并转移至固相支持物，通过特异性试剂（抗体）作为探针，对靶物 …
斑点杂交（Dot blot）是将被检标本点到膜上，烘烤固定。这种方法耗时短，可做半定量分析。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 有意地忘记（不愉快的记忆或想法）；抹去

lj.lj_ly: He tried to blot out the memory of that embarrassing moment.
lj.lj_ls: 他试图忘掉那令人窘迫的时刻。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : probably of Scandinavian origin and related to Old Norse blettr

entry.def: If something is a blot on a person's or thing's reputation, it spoils their reputation.

example.ex: ...a blot on the reputation of the architectural profession...
example.tran: 败坏建筑业名声的污点

example.ex: This drugs scandal is another blot on the Olympics.
example.tran: 这次的兴奋剂丑闻又给奥林匹克运动会抹了黑。

entry.def: A blot is a drop of liquid that has fallen on to a surface and has dried.
If you blot a surface, you remove liquid from it by pressing a piece of soft paper or cloth onto it.

example.ex: Before applying make-up, blot the face with a tissue to remove any excess oils...
example.tran: 上妆前，先用面巾纸把脸上多余的油吸干。

entry.tran: 破坏整体美的事物；煞风景的事物
entry.def: If you describe something such as a building as a blot on the landscape, you mean that you think it is very ugly and spoils an otherwise attractive place.

example.ex: The developers insist the 80m village will not leave a blot on the landscape.
example.tran: 开发商们坚称这个耗资8,000万的居住区不会破坏风景。
